snippet: The French president, who was reportedly mentioned by name as attackers stormed a rock concert in Paris, faces a difficult and perilous path forward as he decides how to respond.
abstract: French Pres Francios Hollande contends with series of coordinated terror attacks across France from Islamic State for second time this year and may have been target of at least one attack.
lead_paragraph: The French president, who was reportedly mentioned by name as attackers stormed a rock concert in Paris, faces a difficult and perilous path forward as he decides how to respond.

headline.main: Paris Gunmen Single Out François Hollande, and Leave Him With Few Palatable Responses
headline.print_headline: Gunmen Single Out Hollande, and Leave Him With Few Palatable Responses

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
